Name: Mars Mission
About the game: The Mars Mission offers real companies and work processes for career orientation! Explore different professions and work processes and find your dream job! You can currently choose between 10 professions and simulate their work processes. Bake baguettes against the clock as a baker deliver parcels by hover truck, assemble a high-tech machine from different components, nurse patients back to health in hospital, mix different cocktails together, and much more! Explore different businesses and fun activities in Hellia City! With the help of earned JoyPoints you can unlock new items such as a hoverboard!
